name: Loopyboopy Creepy Ghost Halloween Ornament
description:
Ghostly ornament is one of a kind,  completely hand sculpted and painted in acrylics, pastels and artists pencils. Her dress is made also sculpted from fabric. Her hair is lambswool.  Ornament measures approx 10-12" 

Wonderful piece for your creepy holiday tree.

name: Custom Art Doll by Loopyboopy
description:
This listing is for a custom doll. Please contact me before purchasing with your ideas @ colleen.113@hotmail.com. With this listing I will create a doll of your liking, meaning hair color, emotion and costume style.  If you see something in my gallery of sold items that interests you please contact me and again we can discuss the perfect doll for you.   Of course the doll will be in my loopy style. If your ideas are not something I feel I can create I will let you know up front.

You can see a large gallery of my work here

https://www.etsy.com/shop/loopyboopy/sold?ref=shopinfo_sales_leftnav

This price is for a basic doll as those pictured. The more elaborate the costuming and details the price will be more. Again, we can discuss this through emails.

name: Loopy Gothic Art Photography Print Vampires
description:
Offering high quality photographic Giclee art print of my own art doll. I created the doll and am the photographer. The doll in the print is sold.

The photograph is 13 x 10 1/5" with a 1" border all around. The paper it is printed on is Somerset Velvet paper with Epson Ultrachrome professional archival inks. The print has a matte finish.

These prints are ordered upon purchase and will be sent to your address from the printing house.

name: Loopy Giclee Art Doll Fine Photography Print
description:
Offering high quality photographic Giclee art print of my own art doll. I created the doll and am the photographer. The doll in the print is sold.

The actual image is 8x8" and the paper it is printed on measures 12x10" The paper it is printed on is Somerset Velvet paper with Epson Ultrachrome professional archival inks. The print has a matte finish.

These prints are ordered upon purchase and will be sent to your address from the printing house.

name: Loopy Gothic Art Doll Print
description:
Offering high quality photographic Giclee art print of my own art doll. I created the doll and am the photographer. The doll in the print is sold.

The actual image is 7x10 with a 1 3/4" border on sides and 3/4" border on top and bottom. The paper it is printed on is Somerset Velvet paper with Epson Ultrachrome professional archival inks. The print has a matte finish.

These prints are ordered upon purchase so please expect 1 week delivery time.
